data.title: Align blocks
data.meta_description: Use our built-in guides to drag blocks to their desired position on your slides.
data.text:
Pitch gives you a few easy ways to keep the content on your slides aligned. You can align text, image, and other types of blocks with other elements on a slide, or along our built-in guides. The guides are the yellow lines that appear when you drag a block close to the vertical and horizontal centers or the edges of the slide, or the edges of nearby blocks.

The easiest way to align a block is to click on it, hold it, and drag it closer to the element(s) you would like to align it with. This also works with multiple blocks: Simply press Shift or Command to select multiple blocks at once, and drag them across the slide to activate the guides.
